>
[Red-Handed Missive](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2065)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Curse" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=38" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Missive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=485" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 85 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Composed to look like an important document, a _red-handed missive_ is a trap used by those who suspect someone has been going through their correspondence. If activated, the missive dissolves into red dye that coats anything touching the missive. Magic in the dye prevents it from washing off for 1 week.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
